articles.description: Acer has refreshed the Swift 5, its compact and lightweight 14-inch laptop series. The SF514-55, which weighs in at under 1 kg, includes a 90% screen-to-body ratio, Intel Tiger Lake processors, an NVIDIA GeForce MX350 GPU and up to 16 GB of RAM. The Acer Swif…
articles.content: Acer has announced the latest entry in the Swift 5 series, the SF514-55. The 14-inch laptop succeeds the Swift 5 SF514-54 that we reviewed earlier this year. While Acer has not made massive changes t… [+1914 chars]

articles.title: Latest version of Fortnite has no police cars - 11Alive
articles.description: The third version of the game came out last week.
